lines.text: The minute I saw him, I didn't give two hoots if he gargled his soup in the key of A Minor. That boy was made for me, and what's more, I'm going to have him.
You can't run around with the right crowd on 45 a week.
Christmas gets more appalling every year.
I enjoy a good time as much as anyone. But I'm working now so I can have fun when I'm older.
A man must be made of strong stuff not to let money spoil him. Don't let it spoil Dick.
Money spoil Dick? Aw, don't be silly. It could never spoil Dick.
